title: By the King and Queen, a declaration William R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at our court at Hampton-Court the fourth day of April, 1689.
Assures English soldiers serving in the Netherlands of receiving English pay.
